hero.headline: MEC Apex Collection
hero.tagline: Mountain classics, reimagined. Meet our new backcountry ski touring system for deep days and human-powered adventures.

promos.text: Grab great deals on skis and snowsports while they last.
Save on parkas and raincoats from MEC, Indyeva, Arc’teryx and more. Because T-shirt weather is months away.
Select styles are on sale and ready to stomp through snowdrifts.
The forecast includes increasing savings and warm, dry kids all day.
